panels.content:
* Use the pull down at the very top left of the page (next to the spiral icon) to select which dashboard you want to look at.
* Use the cluster and other pull downs to select the cluster and protocol of interest.
* Use highlight with your mouse the time period you want to zoom into or use the pull downs at the top right to select specific time periods.
* Note that by default the dates and time displayed are in your browserâ€™s time zone, not the source cluster.   You can get it to display in UTC via the settings under the little gear symbol at the top of the page.
* You can hide rows using the green slide-out tab to the left of each chart.
* If there is a legend displayed you can click on elements within it to hide or display items, etc.
* Click on the title of the chart and then the horizontal bars icon at the left to show/hide the legend and get a CSV export of the data.
* There is no significance in whether things are displayed as lines, bars or points - we have used whatever seems to be clearest for the data.
panels.title: Welcome to the Isilon Detail Dashboard for $cluster

rows.title: Welcome to the Isilon Detail Dashboard for $cluster

targets.query: SELECT 1.0 - mean("value")  / 1000 FROM "cluster.cpu.idle.avg" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100.0 - mean("value") FROM "ifs.percent.avail" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("in_rate") + mean("out_rate") FROM "cluster.protostats.nfs.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("op_rate") FROM "cluster.protostats.nfs.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("time_avg") /1000 FROM "cluster.protostats.nfs.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("in_rate") + mean("out_rate") FROM "cluster.protostats.smb2.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("op_rate") FROM "cluster.protostats.smb2.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("time_avg") /1000 FROM "cluster.protostats.smb2.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100.0 - mean("value") FROM "ifs.percent.avail" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  / 1000 FROM "cluster.cpu.intr.avg" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  / 1000 FROM "cluster.cpu.sys.avg" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  / 1000 FROM "cluster.cpu.user.avg" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  / 1000 FROM "cluster.cpu.idle.avg" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT 1.0 - mean("value") / 1000.0 FROM "cluster.cpu.idle.avg" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("op_rate") FROM /cluster\.protostats\.(.*)\.total/ WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Cluster Protocol Operations and CPU for $cluster

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM /node.clientstats.active.(.*)/ WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Active Client Connections by Protocol for $cluster

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "node.open.files" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cluster.net.ext.packets.in.rate" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cluster.net.ext.bytes.in.rate" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cluster.net.ext.packets.out.rate" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cluster.net.ext.bytes.out.rate" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cluster.net.ext.bytes.out.rate" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cluster.net.ext.packets.out.rate" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cluster.net.ext.packets.out.rate" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cluster.net.ext.bytes.in.rate" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cluster.net.ext.packets.in.rate" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cluster.net.ext.packets.in.rate" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Cluster Network, File System and Disk Throughput for $cluster

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "cluster.net.ext.errors.in.rate" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cluster.net.ext.bytes.out.rate" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "node.je.num_workers_active" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type" fill(null)

yaxes.label: Job Engine Operations per Second Count

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM /node.ifs.heat.(.*).total/ WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("l1_data_prefetch_hit") / max("l1_data_prefetch_start") FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("l1_meta_prefetch_hit") / mean("l1_meta_prefetch_start") FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("l1_data_read_hit") / mean("l1_data_read_start") FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("l1_meta_read_hit") / mean("l1_meta_read_start") FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("l2_data_read_hit") / mean("l2_data_read_start")  FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("l2_meta_read_hit") / mean("l2_meta_read_start")  FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("l3_data_read_hit") / mean("l3_data_read_start")  FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("l3_meta_read_hit") / mean("l3_meta_read_start")  FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("l3_data_read_hit") / mean("l3_data_read_start")  FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
